channel.title: What's the cause of this...?
channel.description: Every night I set my iPod dock so that at 6:30 AM, it plays the song I set it to play, at a high volume, so that I don't sleep through the song playing, and so that I wake up. Since February 15, I've been waking up noticed that my iPod dock's alarm clock has been shutting off after 15 - 30 seconds. It hasn't done this before, and I've questioned my family members, but they claim that they haven't been coming into my room. And I believe them because I sleep with my door locked, and closet entrance blocked off. I haven't been half-sleeping and shutting off my alarm. Trust me. So I'm wondering what could be the cause of this? What do you think?

item.title: What's the cause of this...?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Visitors from outer space.

Read full topic

item.title: What's the cause of this...?

@r0ckstar96 wrote:

But before a week ago, it would play through the whole songs. Quite confusing.

Read full topic

item.title: What's the cause of this...?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Hey, how do you get a music track to play as an alarm? I only see the predefined ones.

Nvm, just read the bit about it being built in to the dock. And don’t worry about being paranoid, I am too, I have my heaters off because I think it will burn the curtains.

Read full topic

item.title: What's the cause of this...?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

som1 is hekking into ur ipod and stopping it

Read full topic

item.title: What's the cause of this...?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Lin:

Hahaha it’s not a ghost.

If you insist.

Lin:

Obviously there’s just problems with your iPod. Contact customer support.

Well, I was whacking my brother with his nerf sword and hit my iPod and dented the dock’s plug in and the iPod’s connector thing at the bottom of it. That could be the reason. But you never know. It could always be ghosts… xP
I have a new habit of underlining words… lol

Read full topic

item.title: What's the cause of this...?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Hahaha it’s not a ghost. Obviously there’s just problems with your iPod. Contact customer support.

Read full topic

item.title: What's the cause of this...?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:330315”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=426699.msg3133868#msg3133868 date=1266738225]
And I believe them because I sleep with my door locked, and closet entrance blocked off.
[/quote]What? What if there were a fire in the house? And why do you block up your closet?

I don’t know what’s with your doc though. Mine used to do weird stuff too, like change the song in the middle of a song for no reason.[/quote]
My sister has a fire escape connected to my brother’s room, where they can escape from a window. And all of my other family members have a window in their room so they could escape from a fire easily. As for me, I’m paranoid and like my privacy. I block my closet entrance so that my brother’s little kid friends don’t sneak into my room. I keep my door locked because it’s just a habit of mine. I also have a thick curtain covering my window because I always fear there is someone just waiting for me to leave the curtain open so they can see everything and me in my room. I have lots of fears and phobias.

runefreak10:

Ghost.

Could be likely. Many people don’t believe in them but I know for a fact that they’re real. I’ve got some true stories of the times I’ve seen ghosts. So does my dad and my brother.

Read full topic

I don’t know what’s with your doc though. Mine used to do weird stuff too, like change the song in the middle of a song for no reason.
